Class StatisticsController.SalesByItemRow

java.lang.Object
controllers.StatisticsController.SalesByItemRow
Enclosing class:
StatisticsController
public static class StatisticsController.SalesByItemRow extends Object
View-model representing sales metrics grouped by item (or category). Used to populate the Sales by Item table and bar chart.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a sales-by-item row.

  • Constructor Details

    • SalesByItemRow

      public SalesByItemRow(String item, int qty, double revenue, double avgPrice)
      Creates a sales-by-item row.
      Parameters:
      item - item or category label
      qty - quantity sold in the selected window
      revenue - total revenue for the item
      avgPrice - average selling price for the item
